list: misty will be the 'final girl' since she's not one of them (she wasn't on the soccer team to begin with). also, her breaking the black box could be considered a 'sacrifice' to the wilderness
there's nothing supernatural - all the strange occurrences are group psychosis ('there was no 'it', 'it' was just us')
coach didn't burn down the cabin - it was other tai, or genuinely an accident
how did javi survive that winter?

title: things to check out next time i visit...
